title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Toss the pasta with pancetta, and then mix in the egg mixture.
Serve with freshly cracked black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with spices and yogurt.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Make the sauce by sautéing onions and adding tomato paste and cream.
Simmer the chicken in the sauce until well coated.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Soft or hard shell tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with a variety of vegetables stir-fried in soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in the egg, then stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup, fruit, or whipped cream.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
In another bowl, whisk eggs and milk together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Margarita Pizza
summary: A simple pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (428°F).
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza base.
Top with mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Bake for 10-15 minutes until the cheese is bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over noodles.
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions and mushrooms until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve over cooked noodles.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: In a bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss gently to combine.
Serve chilled.

title: Lemon Chicken
summary: Chicken breasts cooked in a lemony sauce, served with rice or vegetables.
instructions: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Cook chicken in a pan until golden brown.
Serve with rice or steamed vegetables.

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Tacos filled with grilled fish, cabbage slaw, and a creamy sauce.
instructions: Season fish with taco seasoning and grill until cooked.
Fill taco shells with fish, cabbage slaw, and creamy sauce.
Serve immediately.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
summary: Bell peppers stuffed with a mixture of rice, ground meat, and spices.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a pan, sauté onions and ground beef until browned.
Mix in cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff the bell pepper halves with the mixture.
Bake for 30 minutes until peppers are tender.

title: Pesto Pasta
summary: Pasta tossed with a fresh basil pesto sauce, topped with Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Drain and toss with basil pesto.
Serve topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Chili Con Carne
summary: A spicy stew made with ground beef, beans, tomatoes, and chili spices.
instructions: In a pot, sauté onions until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in kidney beans, diced tomatoes, and chili powder.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Serve with rice or bread.
